rocks.bastion.core.configuration

Class GlobalRequestAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • rocks.bastion.core.configuration.GlobalRequestAttributes

  • public class GlobalRequestAttributes
extends Object
    Request attributes that can be applied to all HTTP requests created by Bastion.
